entry.title: The Glow Up Basket
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 183.20

Description

The Glow Up Basket is your all-in-one Easter wellness ritual — a premium set designed to nourish your body, support your glow, and energise you from the inside out. Featuring our best-selling Super Beauty Greens and Premium Collagen Peptides, this bundle also includes our iconic handheld Collagen Mixer for the ultimate mixing convenience.

The best part? Flavours are fully customisable, so you can personalise your glow journey with the flavours you love most.

Benefits

Super Beauty Greens
Your daily blend for gut health, digestion, and sustained energy.

  • Supports digestion and reduces bloating with prebiotics, probiotics, and enzymes

  • Nourishes the gut microbiome for improved nutrient absorption

  • Delivers over 17 superfoods and organic greens for everyday wellness

  • Natural herbal extracts provide gentle, crash-free energy

  • Naturally flavoured with no added sugar

Premium Collagen Peptides
High-strength collagen to support beauty and mobility from within.

  • 15g of hydrolysed bovine collagen per serve

  • Promotes skin elasticity, hydration, and glow

  • Supports stronger nails and thicker, healthier hair

  • Aids joint health and gut lining integrity

  • Enriched with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin for enhanced results

Ingredients

Super Beauty Greens

  • Organic Greens Blend: Spirulina, Chlorella, Alfalfa Grass, Wheat Grass, and Barley Grass to support detox, digestion, and daily vitality.

  • Superfoods & Antioxidants: A nutrient-rich blend of fruits and vegetables including Acai, Goji, Kale, and Broccoli Sprout for essential vitamins, minerals, and skin-loving antioxidants.

  • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): Grass-fed, pasture-raised collagen to support skin, hair, nails, joints, and gut health.

  • Natural Sea Mineral Complex: A marine-sourced blend of calcium and 72+ trace minerals to support energy, bones, and immunity.

  • Prebiotics & Probiotics: Help balance the gut microbiome, support digestion, and improve nutrient absorption.

  • Digestive Enzymes: Aid in breaking down protein, fats, carbs, and fibre to reduce bloating and support smoother digestion.

  • Herbal Extract Blend: L-theanine, Panax Ginseng, Cacao, Milk Thistle, and Gotu Kola for gentle, sustained energy and focus.

Premium Collagen Peptides

  • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): 15g per serve, from 100% grass-fed, pasture-raised collagen to support healthy skin, strong nails, thicker hair, joint function, and gut integrity.

  • Vitamin C: Enhances natural collagen production and helps protect against oxidative stress.

  • Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and plumps the skin while lubricating joints.

  • Biotin: Supports hair, skin, nail health, and energy metabolism.

Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

Nutrition Information

Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

How to Use

Enjoy both products daily to support beauty, gut health, and overall wellness.

Super Beauty Greens
Mix 2 heaped scoops with 250–350ml of cold water using your mixer.
We recommend taking Super Beauty Greens first thing in the morning to kickstart digestion, nourish your gut microbiome, and energise your day from the inside out.

Premium Collagen Peptides
Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 400ml of cold or hot water and mix well.
It’s delicious on its own and can be enjoyed any time of day — morning, mid-afternoon, or whenever your beauty ritual fits best.

How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. We recommend between 15-30 grams of collagen peptides daily to help support visible results.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

entry.title: Egg-stra Glow Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 175.95

Description

The Egg-stra Glow Bundle is your limited-edition Easter must-have — created to support your glow, energy, and beauty goals in the most delicious way. This bundle features two full-size Glow Shakes and a sachet box of our Premium Collagen Peptides, giving you a complete daily wellness ritual that works hard and tastes amazing.

Packed with protein, collagen, and essential nutrients, it’s designed to keep you satisfied and radiant — wherever the day takes you.

Benefits

Glow Shakes
Beauty, protein, and nutrients in one satisfying shake.

  • Over 29g of protein per serve, including 17.5g of Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides

  • Supports satiety, lean muscle, and weight management

  • Includes 5g+ of gut-friendly prebiotic fibre

  • MCT oil for fat-burning and sustained energy

  • Enriched with 24 vitamins and minerals

  • Less than 1g of sugar per serve

Premium Collagen Peptides 
Clinically supported collagen — anytime, anywhere.

  • 15g of Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides per sachet

  • Promotes skin hydration, elasticity, and glow

  • Supports hair and nail strength

  • Aids joint function and gut health

  • Includes Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin

  • Convenient sachets for on-the-go glow

    Ingredients

      Glow Shakes

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): Highly bioavailable collagen to support skin, hair, nails, joints, and overall wellness

      • Whey & Milk Protein Isolates: Promote satiety, muscle recovery, and strength

      • MCT Oil: Supports fat metabolism, mental clarity, and sustained energy

      • Prebiotic Fibre: Supports digestive health, gut balance, and nutrient absorption

      • 24 Vitamins & Minerals: A full spectrum of essential nutrients to support beauty, metabolism, and immune health

      Premium Collagen Peptides (Sachets)

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): 15g per serve from grass-fed, pasture-raised collagen for healthy hair, skin, nails and joints.

      • Vitamin C: Supports natural collagen production and antioxidant protection

      • Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates skin and lubricates joints

      • Biotin: Supports hair, skin, nails, and energy metabolism

      Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

      Nutrition Information

      Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

      How to Use

      Enjoy both products daily as part of your beauty and wellness routine.

      Glow Shakes
      Mix 1 serve (2 heaped scoops) with 350ml of chilled water or your favourite milk/milk alternative.
      Shake or blend well. Best enjoyed as a meal replacement, post-workout boost, or satisfying snack.

      For your weight loss journey, or if you're looking to manage weight, you can replace up to 2 meals per day with Glow Shakes alongside a balanced, nutritious diet.

      Premium Collagen Peptides (Sachets)
      Mix 1 sachet with 250–400ml of cold or hot water. Stir or shake until fully dissolved.
      Enjoy any time of day — morning, mid-afternoon, or as a glow-up on the go.

        How many serves a day?
        How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. We recommend between 15-30 grams of collagen peptides daily to support visible results.

        Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

entry.title: Easter Reset Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 217.60

Description

The Easter Reset Bundle is your complete glow ritual — from morning greens to a nourishing shake and a dreamy nightcap. Featuring Super Beauty Greens, a Glow Shake, and Collagen Dream, this limited-edition bundle is designed to support digestion, energy, beauty, and sleep in one easy, daily routine.

It’s a full day of wellness, sorted. Reset, rebalance, and glow — morning to night.

Benefits

Super Beauty Greens
Your AM ritual to support digestion, energy, and skin clarity.

  • Promotes digestive comfort and gut balance

  • Provides a full spectrum of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants

  • Supports skin clarity and glow from within

  • Helps reduce bloating and improve nutrient absorption

  • Delivers gentle, sustained energy

Glow Shake
Midday nourishment with beauty-boosting benefits.

  • Keeps you full and satisfied with over 29g of protein

  • Supports skin, hair, and nail health with 17.5g of collagen

  • Promotes lean muscle and weight management

  • Enriched with MCT oil, prebiotic fibre, and 24 vitamins and minerals

  • A convenient, low-sugar shake for beauty and wellness on the go

Collagen Dream
Your calming night-time ritual for rest and repair.

  • Supports deep, restful sleep and overnight skin repair

  • Helps reduce stress and unwind the mind

  • Promotes joint comfort and muscle recovery

  • Includes calming herbs like chamomile, passionflower, and valerian

  • A delicious collagen-rich hot chocolate to end your day

    Ingredients

      Super Beauty Greens

      • Organic Greens Blend: Spirulina, Chlorella, Alfalfa, Wheat Grass, Barley Grass

      • Superfoods & Antioxidants: Acai, Goji, Kale, Broccoli Sprout, and more

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

      • Natural Sea Mineral Complex (72+ trace minerals)

      • Prebiotics & Probiotics

      • Digestive Enzymes

      • Herbal Extract Blend: L-theanine, Panax Ginseng, Cacao, Milk Thistle, Gotu Kola

      Glow Shakes

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): 17.5g per serve

      • Whey & Milk Protein Isolates

      • MCT Oil

      • Prebiotic Fibre

      • 24 Vitamins & Minerals

      Collagen Dream

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): 5g per serve

      • Magnesium & Zinc

      • Chamomile, Passionflower, Valerian Root

      • L-Theanine & L-Tryptophan

      Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

      Nutrition Information

      Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

      How to Use

      Your full-day glow ritual — from sunrise to sleep.

      Morning: Super Beauty Greens
      Start your day with 2 heaped scoops mixed into 250–350ml of cold water.
      Best taken first thing in the morning on an empty stomach to support digestion, gut health, and all-day energy.

      Daytime: Glow Shake
      For a quick on the go breakfast and/or around midday or whenever hunger hits, mix 1 serving (2 scoops) with 350ml of chilled water or your preferred milk.
      This shake helps keep you full, energised, and nourished — perfect post-workout, as a light meal, or an afternoon pick-me-up.

      For your weight loss journey, or if you're looking to manage weight, you can replace up to 2 meals per day with Glow Shakes alongside a balanced, nutritious diet.

      Night: Collagen Dream
      30 minutes before bed, mix 2 scoops with 200–250ml of hot water and stir until smooth.
      Add a splash of milk for extra creaminess and enjoy as your calming nightly ritual to support relaxation, recovery, and restful sleep.

      How many serves a day?
      How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. For best results, aim for 15–30g of collagen peptides daily, depending on your health and beauty goals.

      Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

entry.title: Choc Treat Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 228.80

Description

The Choc Treat Bundle is your limited-edition Easter moment of indulgence — with beauty, wellness, and rest wrapped in rich chocolate flavour. This decadent bundle includes three chocolate Glow Shakes and the Limited Edition Violet Crumble Collagen Dream sleep formula, combining functional ingredients with feel-good flavour to support you day and night.

Designed to satisfy sweet cravings while nourishing your body, it’s the ultimate treat for glowing skin, deep sleep, and guilt-free enjoyment — no added sugar, just results you can feel.

Benefits

Glow Shakes
Fuel your day with a beauty-boosting shake that satisfies.

  • Keeps you feeling full and energised with over 29g of protein per serve

  • Supports healthy weight management as part of a low-sugar, high-protein diet

  • Helps promote clearer, more radiant skin from within

  • Contributes to stronger hair and nails with high-dose collagen

  • Supports digestive health and gut comfort with fibre and gentle nutrients

  • Makes sticking to your routine easy — just shake, sip, glow

Collagen Dream
Unwind, relax, and glow while you sleep.

  • Supports deeper, more restful sleep to help your body recover overnight

  • Helps calm the mind and reduce stress at the end of the day

  • Promotes skin repair and renewal while you rest

  • Aids joint comfort and overall recovery while you sleep

  • Offers a delicious, guilt-free hot chocolate ritual you’ll look forward to every night

    Ingredients

      Glow Shakes

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): 17.5g per serve to support healthy skin, hair, nails, joints, and gut health

      • Whey & Milk Protein Isolates: High-quality protein sources to support satiety, lean muscle, and recovery

      • MCT Oil: Supports fat metabolism, appetite control, and sustained energy

      • Prebiotic Fibre: Nourishes gut bacteria and promotes digestive health

      • 24 Vitamins & Minerals: Includes essential nutrients like Vitamin A, B vitamins, C, D, E, calcium, magnesium, zinc, iron, and more to support overall wellness and beauty

      Collagen Dream

      • Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine): 5g per serve to support skin elasticity, joint health, and overnight recovery

      • Magnesium & Zinc: Help regulate melatonin production and promote deep, restful sleep

      • Chamomile, Passionflower, and Valerian Root: Natural herbs known to reduce anxiety and support relaxation

      • L-Theanine & L-Tryptophan: Amino acids that promote calm, enhance mood, and support the sleep cycle

      Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

      Nutrition Information

      Please refer to the individual product pages for full nutritional information and ingredient breakdowns.

      How to Use

      Enjoy both products daily as part of your beauty, wellness, and wind-down routine.

      Glow Shakes
      Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 350ml of chilled water or your preferred milk or milk alternative.
      Shake or blend well until smooth.
      Best enjoyed in the morning, post-workout, or as a satisfying meal replacement or snack.

      For your weight loss journey, replace up to 2 meals a day with Glow Shakes alongside a balanced, nutritious diet.

      Collagen Dream
      Add 1 serving (2 scoops) to 200–250ml of hot water.
      Stir until completely dissolved.
      Optional: Add a splash of milk or milk alternative for extra creaminess.

      We recommend enjoying Collagen Dream approximately 30 minutes before bed to support relaxation and restful sleep.

      How many serves a day?
      How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. We recommend 15–30g of collagen peptides daily to support beauty, gut, and sleep goals.

      Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.
